text: San Andreas is a 2015 adventure and disaster movie. It is about an earthquake hitting California, when the San Andreas Fault shakes. Dwayne Johnson plays Ray. Carla Gugino plays Emma, his ex-wife. Ioan Gruffudd plays Emma's boyfriend Daniel Riddick. Kylie Minogue plays Daniel's sister Beth Riddick. Paul Giamatti plays Caltech seismologist Lawrence Hayes. The movie was released on May 29, 2015. ==References== Category:American disaster movies Category:2010s action movies Category:2015 movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Nevada Category:Movies about earthquakes Category:Movies about tsunamis
title: San Andreas (movie)
